content.shake: Byte The 'shake' when arrows hit a block.
content.inData: Byte Metadata of the tile the arrow is in.
content.pickup: Byte 0: can't be picked up by players, 1: can be picked up in survival and creative, 2: can only be picked up by players in creative
content.player: Byte If pickup is not used, and this is true, the arrow can be picked up by players.
